General.Name: Huawen Media Investment Corp
General.Description: Huawen Media Group operates in the media business in China. It engages in the provision of information transmission, software, and information technology; labor services; and develops Automotive professional technology. In addition, the company provides advertising services; purchases and sells commodities; and publishes newspapers and magazines. The company was formerly known as China Media Group and changed its name to Huawen Media Group in June 2018. Huawen Media Group is based in Haikou, China.
